text: Kadhanayika is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film directed by Manoj Babu. ==Cast== * Vijay Menon as Prasad * Sathaar as C.I. Thomaskutty *Ramya Krishnan as Sharada *Prathapachandran as Vasudevan *Vincent as Minister Janardhana Kurup *Sudheer as Film Producer *Hari *Mafia Sasi as Gunda *Rajasekharan *VP Ramachandran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kadhanayika
